openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /config/stores:
    post:
      description: Create tax calculation configuration for the given store identifier.
      operationId: createStoreConfig
      parameters:
        - name: x-request-id
          in: header
          description: Request identifier.
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                store_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Store identifier within the NewStore platform.
                  example: '123'
                country_code:
                  allOf:
                    - type: string
                      enum:
                        - AF
                        - AX
                        - AL
                        - DZ
                        - AS
                        - AD
                        - AO
                        - AI
                        - AQ
                        - AG
                        - AR
                        - AM
                        - AW
                        - AU
                        - AT
                        - AZ
                        - BS
                        - BH
                        - BD
                        - BB
                        - BY
                        - BE
                        - BZ
                        - BJ
                        - BM
                        - BT
                        - BO
                        - BA
                        - BW
                        - BV
                        - BR
                        - IO
                        - BN
                        - BG
                        - BF
                        - BI
                        - KH
                        - CM
                        - CA
                        - CV
                        - KY
                        - CF
                        - TD
                        - CL
                        - CN
                        - CX
                        - CC
                        - CO
                        - KM
                        - CG
                        - CD
                        - CK
                        - CR
                        - CI
                        - HR
                        - CU
                        - CY
                        - CZ
                        - DK
                        - DJ
                        - DM
                        - DO
                        - EC
                        - EG
                        - SV
                        - GQ

                        - FI
                        - FR

                        - PF
                        - TF

                        - GH

                        - GR

                        - GP

                        - GW

                        - VA
                        - HN
                        - HK
                        - HU
                        - IS
                        - IN
                        - ID
                        - IR
                        - IQ
                        - IE
                        - IM
                        - IL
                        - IT
                        - JM
                        - JP
                        - JE
                        - JO
                        - KZ
                        - KE
                        - KI
                        - KR
                        - KW
                        - KG
                        - LA
                        - LV
                        - LB
                        - LS
                        - LR
                        - LY
                        - LI
                        - LT
                        - LU
                        - MO
                        - MK
                        - MG
                        - MW
                        - MY
                        - MV
                        - ML
                        - MT
                        - MH
                        - MQ
                        - MR
                        - MU
                        - YT
                        - MX
                        - FM
                        - MD
                        - MC
                        - MN
                        - ME
                        - MS
                        - MA
                        - MZ
                        - MM
                        - NA
                        - NR
                        - NP
                        - NL
                        - AN
                        - NC
                        - NZ
                        - NI
                        - NE
                        - NG
                        - NU
                        - NF
                        - MP
                        - 'NO'
                        - OM
                        - PK
                        - PW
                        - PS
                        - PA
                        - PG
                        - PY
                        - PE
                        - PH
                        - PN
                        - PL
                        - PT
                        - PR
                        - QA
                        - RE
                        - RO
                        - RU
                        - RW
                        - BL
                        - SH
                        - KN
                        - LC
                        - MF
                        - PM
                        - VC
                        - WS
                        - SM
                        - ST
                        - SA
                        - SN
                        - RS
                        - SC
                        - SL
                        - SG
                        - SK
                        - SI
                        - SB
                        - SO
                        - ZA
                        - GS
                        - ES
                        - LK
                        - SD
                        - SR
                        - SJ
                        - SZ
                        - SE
                        - CH
                        - SY
                        - TW
                        - TJ
                        - TZ
                        - TH
                        - TL
                        - TG
                        - TK
                        - TO
                        - TT
                        - TN
                        - TR
                        - TM
                        - TC
                        - TV
                        - UG
                        - UA
                        - AE
                        - GB
                        - US
                        - UM
                        - UY
                        - UZ
                        - VU
                        - VE
                        - VN
                        - VG
                        - VI
                        - WF
                        - EH
                        - YE
                        - ZM
                        - ZW
                      description: Country code in upper-case ISO 3166 Alpha-2 format.
                      example: DE
                tax_calculation_strategy:
                  allOf:
                    - type: string
                      enum:
                        - fixedrate
                        - fixed_rate_per_country
                        - avalara
                        - vertex
                        - custom
                      description: Tax calculation strategy.
                      example: fixedrate
                fixed_rate:
                  description: >-
                    Fixed rate configuration.

                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `fixedrate`, the
                    specified tax rate will be used.

                    * For the other tax calculation strategies, the specified
                    rate will be used as a fallback if the tax calculation fails
                    (e.g. if the tax provider is not reachable).

                    * The specified rate will be used as a fallback by the
                    Associate App in offline-mode.
                  example:
                    tax_rate: 0.2
                    tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Austria
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        tax_rate:
                          type: number
                          description: >-
                            Tax rate to be used as a fixed rate during tax
                            calculations.

                            * Allows up to 5 decimal points.
                          example: 0.19
                          format: double
                        tax_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Tax name to be used in the tax lines.
                          example: Standard VAT rate
                        exemption_classes:
                          description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                          example:
                            - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              valid_countries:
                                - '*'
                            - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              valid_countries:
                                - US
                            - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                              valid_countries:
                                - CA
                              display_text:
                                en: First Nation Citizen
                                fr: Premières Nations
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              exemption_class:
                                allOf:
                                  - type: string
                                    enum:
                                      - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                                      - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                                      - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                                      - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                                      - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                                      - RESALE
                                      - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                                      - OTHER
                                      - NON_RESIDENT
                                      - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                                      - CUSTOM_*
                                    description: >-
                                      The tax exemption class that identifies
                                      the customer's group/organization that
                                      accredited them with the tax exemption
                                      status.

                                      * For custom tax exemption classes, the
                                      `CUSTOM_` prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE
                                      key can be used. Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                                    example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              valid_countries:
                                type: array
                                description: >-
                                  The list of countries where this tax exemption
                                  class is valid.
                                items:
                                  type: string
                                  enum:
                                    - '*'
                                    - AF
                                    - AX
                                    - AL
                                    - DZ
                                    - AS
                                    - AD
                                    - AO
                                    - AI
                                    - AQ
                                    - AG
                                    - AR
                                    - AM
                                    - AW
                                    - AU
                                    - AT

                                    - LK
                                    - SD
                                    - SR
                                    - SJ
                                    - SZ
                                    - SE
                                    - CH
                                    - SY
                                    - TW
                                    - TJ
                                    - TZ
                                    - TH
                                    - TL
                                    - TG
                                    - TK
                                    - TO
                                    - TT
                                    - TN

                                    - TM
                                    - TC
                                    - TV
                                    - UG
                                    - UA
                                    - AE
                                    - GB
                                    - US
                                    - UM

                                    - UZ
                                    - VU
                                    - VE
                                    - VN
                                    - VG
                                    - VI
                                    - WF
                                    - EH
                                    - YE
                                    - ZM
                                    - ZW
                                  description: >-
                                    The list of countries where this tax
                                    exemption class is relevant.
                                        * '*' indicates worldwide support
                                  example: '*'
                              display_text:
                                type: object
                                description: >-
                                  Display text to be used in Associate App while
                                  rendering the exemption class.

                                  * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                                  * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption
                                  classes.

                                  * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language
                                  code.

                                  * Must include English translation by default.
                                example:
                                  en: First Nation Citizen
                                  fr: Premières Nations
                                additionalProperties: {}
                            required:
                              - exemption_class
                              - valid_countries
                      required:
                        - tax_rate
                fixed_rate_per_country:
                  type: object
                  description: >-
                    Fixed rate configuration per country.

                    * Uses ISO 3166 Alpha-2 format as the key in upper-case.

                    * Fixed rate specification can be defined under each country
                    key for the desired countries.

                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to
                    `fixed_rate_per_country`:
                      * Fixed rate configuration must be configured.
                      * The specified tax rate will be used if the country code of the store has a fixed rate configuration.
                      * The tax calculation will fail if the country code of the store does not have a fixed rate configuration.
                  example:
                    AT:
                      tax_rate: 0.2
                      tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Austria
                    DE:
                      tax_rate: 0.19
                      tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Germany
                  additionalProperties:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      tax_rate:
                        type: number
                        description: >-
                          Tax rate to be used as a fixed rate during tax
                          calculations.

                          * Allows up to 5 decimal points.
                        example: 0.19
                        format: double
                      tax_name:
                        type: string
                        description: Tax name to be used in the tax lines.
                        example: Standard VAT rate
                      exemption_classes:
                        description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                        example:
                          - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                            valid_countries:
                              - '*'
                          - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                            valid_countries:
                              - US
                          - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                            valid_countries:
                              - CA
                            display_text:
                              en: First Nation Citizen
                              fr: Premières Nations
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            exemption_class:
                              allOf:
                                - type: string
                                  enum:
                                    - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                                    - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                                    - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                                    - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                                    - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                                    - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                                    - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                                    - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                                    - RESALE
                                    - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                                    - OTHER
                                    - NON_RESIDENT
                                    - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                                    - CUSTOM_*
                                  description: >-
                                    The tax exemption class that identifies the
                                    customer's group/organization that
                                    accredited them with the tax exemption
                                    status.

                                    * For custom tax exemption classes, the
                                    `CUSTOM_` prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key
                                    can be used. Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                                  example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                            valid_countries:
                              type: array
                              description: >-
                                The list of countries where this tax exemption
                                class is valid.
                              items:
                                type: string
                                enum:
                                  - '*'
                                  - AF
                                  - AX
                                  - AL
                                  - DZ
                                  - AS
                                  - AD
                                  - AO
                                  - AI
                                  - AQ
                                  - AG

                                description: >-
                                  The list of countries where this tax exemption
                                  class is relevant.
                                      * '*' indicates worldwide support
                                example: '*'
                            display_text:
                              type: object
                              description: >-
                                Display text to be used in Associate App while
                                rendering the exemption class.

                                * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                                * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption
                                classes.

                                * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.

                                * Must include English translation by default.
                              example:
                                en: First Nation Citizen
                                fr: Premières Nations
                              additionalProperties: {}
                          required:
                            - exemption_class
                            - valid_countries
                    required:
                      - tax_rate
                avalara:
                  description: >-
                    Avalara configuration.

                    * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to
                    `avalara`.

                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `avalara`, the
                    given configuration will be used.

                    * If the Avalara configuration is defined, the configuration
                    will be validated through a ping request to Avalara, which
                    will validate the authenticity of Avalara credentials.
                  example:
                    account_number: '2000123456'
                    company_code: NEWSTOREINC
                    default_customer_code: Anonymous customer
                    license_key: C1234567890ABCFE
                    environment: sandbox
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        account_number:
                          type: string
                          description: AvaTax account number or account ID.
                          example: '2000123456'
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 10
                        company_code:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            Company code that identifies the company in the
                            AvaTax account.

                            * Value is case-sensitive.

                            * Declared during the company setup in the AvaTax
                            Admin Console.
                          example: NEWSTOREINC
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 25
                        default_customer_code:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            Default customer code. Will be used in case when no
                            ConsumerUUID is provided.
                          example: Anonymous customer
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 50
                        license_key:
                          type: string
                          description: AvaTax license key.
                          format: password
                          example: C1234567890ABCFE
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 16
                        environment:
                          allOf:
                            - type: string
                              enum:
                                - sandbox
                                - production
                              description: Avalara environment.
                              example: sandbox
                        exemption_classes:
                          description: >-
                            A list of mappings between `ExemptionClass` enum and
                            Avalara custom entity use codes.
                          example:
                            - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              avalara_entity_use_code: E
                              valid_countries:
                                - '*'
                            - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              avalara_entity_use_code: A
                              valid_countries:
                                - US
                            - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                              avalara_entity_use_code: CANADA_FNC
                              valid_countries:
                                - CA
                              display_text:
                                en: First Nation Citizen
                                fr: Premières Nations
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              exemption_class:
                                allOf:
                                  - type: string
                                    enum:
                                      - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                                      - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                                      - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                                      - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                                      - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                                      - RESALE
                                      - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                                      - OTHER
                                      - NON_RESIDENT
                                      - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                                      - CUSTOM_*
                                    description: >-
                                      The tax exemption class that identifies
                                      the customer's group/organization that
                                      accredited them with the tax exemption
                                      status.

                                      * For custom tax exemption classes, the
                                      `CUSTOM_` prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE
                                      key can be used. Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                                    example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              valid_countries:
                                type: array
                                description: >-
                                  The list of countries where this tax exemption
                                  class is valid.
                                items:
                                  type: string
                                  enum:
                                    - '*'
                                    - AF
                                    - AX
                                    - AL
                                    - DZ
                                    - AS
                                    - AD
                                    - AO
                                    - AI
                                    - AQ
                                    - AG
                                    - AR
                                    - AM
                                    - AW
                                    - AU
                                    - AT
                                    - AZ
                                    - BS
                                    - BH
                                    - BD
                                    - BB
                                    - BY
                                    - BE
                                    - BZ
                                    - BJ
                                    - BM
                                    - BT
                                    - BO
                                    - BA
                                    - BW
                                    - BV
                                    - BR
                                    - IO
                                    - BN
                                    - BG
                                    - BF
                                    - BI
                                    - KH
                                    - CM
                                    - CA
                                    - CV
                                    - KY
                                    - CF
                                    - TD
                                    - CL

                                    - ZW
                                  description: >-
                                    The list of countries where this tax
                                    exemption class is relevant.
                                        * '*' indicates worldwide support
                                  example: '*'
                              display_text:
                                type: object
                                description: >-
                                  Display text to be used in Associate App while
                                  rendering the exemption class.

                                  * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                                  * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption
                                  classes.

                                  * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language
                                  code.

                                  * Must include English translation by default.
                                example:
                                  en: First Nation Citizen
                                  fr: Premières Nations
                                additionalProperties: {}
                              avalara_entity_use_code:
                                type: string
                                description: >-
                                  Avalara entity use code.

                                  * For pre-defined tax exemption classes, value
                                  must correspond to the Avalara entity use
                                  code. For the possible options, please refer
                                  to the [List of entity use
                                  codes](https://knowledge.avalara.com/bundle/hff1682048150115_hff1682048150115/page/List_of_entity_use_codes.html).

                                  * For custom tax exemption classes, value must
                                  correspond to the custom entity use code
                                  defined under the exempt entity custom tax
                                  rule.
                                example: CANADA_FNC
                                minLength: 1
                                maxLength: 25
                            required:
                              - exemption_class
                              - valid_countries
                              - avalara_entity_use_code
                      required:
                        - account_number
                        - company_code
                        - license_key
                        - environment
                vertex:
                  description: >-
                    Vertex configuration.

                    * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to
                    `vertex`.

                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `vertex`, the
                    given configuration will be used.

                    * If the Vertex configuration is defined, the configuration
                    will be validated through a ping request to Vertex, which
                    will validate the authenticity of Vertex credentials.
                  example:
                    company_code: '1234'
                    division_code: '1234'
                    soap_url: >-
                      https://sandboxap2.na1.ondemand.vertexinc.com/vertex-ws/services/CalculateTax90
                    login_type: trusted_id
                    trusted_id: 9SDPdc9bo3
                    flexible_fields:
                      - extended_attribute_name: productClass
                        target_field_id: 1
                        target_field_type: flexible_code_field
                      - extended_attribute_name: shoeSize
                        target_field_id: 1
                        target_field_type: flexible_numeric_field
                    administrative_origin:
                      street_address_1: Potsdamer Str. 7
                      street_address_2: Potsdamer Platz
                      city: Berlin
                      main_division: Berlin
                      postal_code: '10785'
                      country: DE
                      currency_code: EUR
                      currency_value: 1.1
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        company_code:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            Vertex taxpayer code of the company.

                            * Identifies the top-level legal entity (company).

                            * The value should be set to the taxpayer code of
                            the top-level taxpayer (company).
                          example: '1234'
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 40
                        division_code:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            Vertex taxpayer code of the division.

                            * Identifies the mid-level legal entity (division)
                            under a top-level legal entity (company).

                            * If exists, the value can be set to the taxpayer
                            code of the mid-level taxpayer (division) under a
                            top-level taxpayer (company).
                          example: '1234'
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 40
                        soap_url:
                          type: string
                          description: SOAP URL of the Vertex CalculateTax endpoint.
                          example: >-
                            https://sandboxap2.na1.ondemand.vertexinc.com/vertex-ws/services/CalculateTax90
                          format: uri
                        login_type:
                          allOf:
                            - type: string
                              enum:
                                - trusted_id
                                - user_and_password
                              description: >-
                                Vertex Login Type.

                                * Used for selecting the authentication method.

                                * `trusted_id` field is required if `login_type`
                                is set to `trusted_id`.

                                * `username` and `password` fields are required
                                if `login_type` is set to `user_and_password`.
                              example: trusted_id
                        trusted_id:
                          type: string
                          description: |-
                            Trusted ID of the Vertex account.
                            * Required if `login_type` is set to `trusted_id`.
                          format: password
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 255
                        username:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            Username of the Vertex account.

                            * Required if `login_type` is set to
                            `user_and_password`.
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 255
                        password:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            Password of the Vertex account.

                            * Required if `login_type` is set to
                            `user_and_password`.
                          format: password
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 255
                        flexible_fields:
                          description: >-
                            The mapping between extended attributes of items in
                            the NewStore platform and flexible fields as defined
                            in Vertex.
                          example:
                            - extended_attribute_name: productClass
                              target_field_id: 1
                              target_field_type: flexible_code_field
                            - extended_attribute_name: shoeSize
                              target_field_id: 1
                              target_field_type: flexible_numeric_field
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              extended_attribute_name:
                                type: string
                                description: The name of the extended attribute.
                                example: shoeSize
                                minLength: 1
                                maxLength: 255
                              target_field_id:
                                type: integer
                                description: >-
                                  Vertex flexible field identifier.

                                  * If `target_field_type` is set to
                                  `flexible_code_field`, maximum length is 25.

                                  * If `target_field_type` is set to
                                  `flexible_numeric_field`, maximum length is
                                  10.

                                  * If `target_field_type` is set to
                                  `flexible_date_field`, maximum length is 5.
                                format: int32
                                minimum: 0
                                maximum: 25
                                example: 1
                              target_field_type:
                                allOf:
                                  - type: string
                                    enum:
                                      - flexible_code_field
                                      - flexible_numeric_field
                                      - flexible_date_field
                                    description: Vertex flexible field type.
                                    example: flexible_numeric_field
                            required:
                              - extended_attribute_name
                              - target_field_id
                              - target_field_type
                        administrative_origin:
                          description: >-
                            Administrative origin information of the legal
                            entity. Should be set based on the retailer
                            corporate information.
                          example:
                            street_address_1: Potsdamer Str. 7
                            street_address_2: Potsdamer Platz
                            city: Berlin
                            main_division: Berlin
                            postal_code: '10785'
                            country: Germany
                            currency_code: USD
                            currency_value: 1.1
                          allOf:
                            - type: object
                              properties:
                                street_address_1:
                                  type: string
                                  description: The first line of the street address.
                                  example: Potsdamer Str. 7
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 100
                                street_address_2:
                                  type: string
                                  description: The second line of the street address.
                                  example: Potsdamer Platz
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 100
                                city:
                                  type: string
                                  description: >-
                                    The proper name of the city used to
                                    determine the Tax Area ID.
                                  example: Berlin
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 60
                                main_division:
                                  type: string
                                  description: >-
                                    The proper name or the postal abbreviation
                                    of the state, province, or territory used to
                                    determine the Tax Area ID.
                                  example: Berlin
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 60
                                postal_code:
                                  type: string
                                  description: >-
                                    The postal code used to determine the Tax
                                    Area ID
                                  example: '10785'
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 20
                                country:

                        exemption_classes:
                          description: >-
                            A list of mappings between `ExemptionClass` enum and
                            Vertex class codes.
                          example:
                            - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              vertex_class_code: '02'
                              valid_countries:
                                - '*'
                            - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              vertex_class_code: '01'
                              valid_countries:
                                - US
                            - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA
                              vertex_class_code: '03'
                              valid_countries:
                                - CA
                              display_text:
                                en: First Nation Citizen
                                fr: Premières Nations
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              exemption_class:
                                allOf:
                                  - type: string
                                    enum:
                                      - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                                      - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                                      - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                                      - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                                      - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                                      - RESALE
                                      - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                                      - OTHER
                                      - NON_RESIDENT
                                      - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                                      - CUSTOM_*
                                    description: >-
                                      The tax exemption class that identifies
                                      the customer's group/organization that
                                      accredited them with the tax exemption
                                      status.

                                      * For custom tax exemption classes, the
                                      `CUSTOM_` prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE
                                      key can be used. Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                                    example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              valid_countries:
                                type: array
                                description: >-
                                  The list of countries where this tax exemption
                                  class is valid.
                                items:
                                  type: string
                                  enum:
                                    - '*'
                                    - AF
                                    - AX
                                    - AL
                                    - DZ
                                    - AS

                                    - ME
                                    - MS
                                    - MA
                                    - MZ
                                    - MM
                                    - NA
                                    - NR
                                    - NP
                                    - NL
                                    - AN
                                    - NC
                                    - NZ
                                    - NI
                                    - NE
                                    - NG
                                    - NU
                                    - NF
                                    - MP
                                    - 'NO'
                                    - OM
                                    - PK
                                    - PW
                                    - PS
                                    - PA
                                    - PG
                                    - PY
                                    - PE
                                    - PH
                                    - PN
                                    - PL
                                    - PT
                                    - PR

                                    - RE

                                    - RU
                                    - RW
                                    - BL
                                    - SH
                                    - KN
                                    - LC
                                    - MF
                                    - PM
                                    - VC
                                    - WS
                                    - SM
                                    - ST
                                    - SA
                                    - SN
                                    - RS
                                    - SC
                                    - SL
                                    - SG
                                    - SK
                                    - SI
                                    - SB
                                    - SO
                                    - ZA
                                    - GS
                                    - ES
                                    - LK
                                    - SD
                                    - SR
                                    - SJ
                                    - SZ
                                    - SE
                                    - CH
                                    - SY
                                    - TW
                                    - TJ
                                    - TZ
                                    - TH
                                    - TL
                                    - TG
                                    - TK
                                    - TO
                                    - TT
                                    - TN
                                    - TR
                                    - TM
                                    - TC
                                    - TV
                                    - UG
                                    - UA
                                    - AE
                                    - GB
                                    - US
                                    - UM
                                    - UY
                                    - UZ
                                    - VU
                                    - VE
                                    - VN
                                    - VG
                                    - VI
                                    - WF
                                    - EH
                                    - YE
                                    - ZM
                                    - ZW
                                  description: >-
                                    The list of countries where this tax
                                    exemption class is relevant.
                                        * '*' indicates worldwide support
                                  example: '*'
                              display_text:
                                type: object
                                description: >-
                                  Display text to be used in Associate App while
                                  rendering the exemption class.

                                  * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                                  * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption
                                  classes.

                                  * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language
                                  code.

                                  * Must include English translation by default.
                                example:
                                  en: First Nation Citizen
                                  fr: Premières Nations
                                additionalProperties: {}
                              vertex_class_code:
                                type: string
                                description: >-
                                  Vertex class code.

                                  * A code used to represent groups of
                                  customers, vendors, dispatchers, or recipients
                                  who have similar taxability.
                                example: '01'
                                minLength: 1
                                maxLength: 20
                            required:
                              - exemption_class
                              - valid_countries
                              - vertex_class_code
                        use_location_code:
                          type: boolean
                          description: >-
                            Use Vertex location code instead of address
                            information.

                            * When this value is set to `true` the NewStore
                            platform will use the Store IDs to communicate
                            origin and destination addresses instead of using
                            standard address information (address line 1, postal
                            code, etc.).

                            * Store IDs are currently only available for cash &
                            carry orders, all other order scenarios will use the
                            standard address information to communicate origin
                            and destination addresses even with this value set
                            to `true`.

                            * In case the NewStore Store ID length is longer
                            than 20 characters, NewStore will only send the
                            first 20 characters as Vertex field length is capped
                            at that limit.
                          example: true
                          default: false
                        jurisdiction_in_tax_name_enabled:
                          type: boolean
                          description: >-
                            Enable appending the jurisdiction name to the tax
                            line's `tax_name` field.

                            * This can help identify which jurisdiction imposed
                            a given tax line.

                            * Example: The tax name `Sales And Use Tax -
                            Colorado` includes the jurisdiction name `Colorado`
                            when the given flag is enabled.
                          example: true
                      required:
                        - company_code
                        - soap_url
                        - login_type
                custom:
                  description: >-
                    Custom provider configuration.

                    * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to
                    `custom`.

                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom`, the
                    given configuration will be used.
                  example:
                    api_version: v1
                    base_url: https://my-custom-tax-url.com
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        api_version:
                          allOf:
                            - type: string
                              enum:
                                - v0-avalara
                                - v1
                              description: Custom provider API version.
                              example: v1
                        additional_config:
                          description: >-
                            Other necessary configuration specific to the custom
                            provider (currently configs for non-officially
                            supported avalara based custom implementation)
                          allOf:
                            - type: object
                              properties:
                                avalara:
                                  description: >-
                                    Avalara custom provider configuration.

                                    * Required if the `api_version` is set to
                                    `v0-avalara`.

                                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to
                                    `custom` and `api_version` is set to
                                    `v0-avalara`, the given configuration will
                                    be used.
                                  example:
                                    account_number: '2000123456'
                                    company_code: NEWSTOREINC
                                    license_key: C1234567890ABCFE
                                    url: https://custom.provider.net/1.0/tax/get
                                  allOf:
                                    - type: object
                                      properties:
                                        account_number:
                                          type: string
                                          description: AvaTax account number or account ID.
                                          example: '2000123456'
                                          minLength: 1
                                          maxLength: 10
                                        company_code:
                                          type: string
                                          description: >-
                                            Company code that identifies the company
                                            in the AvaTax account.

                                            * Value is case-sensitive.

                                            * Declared during the company setup in
                                            the AvaTax Admin Console.
                                          example: NEWSTOREINC
                                          minLength: 1
                                          maxLength: 25
                                        license_key:
                                          type: string
                                          description: AvaTax license key.
                                          format: password
                                          example: C1234567890ABCFE
                                          minLength: 1
                                          maxLength: 16
                                        url:
                                          type: string
                                          description: >-
                                            Custom provider RESTful API URL that
                                            uses AvaTax v1 schema. Will be used for
                                            tax calculations.
                                          example: https://custom.provider.net/1.0/tax/get
                                          format: uri
                                      required:
                                        - account_number
                                        - company_code
                                        - license_key
                                        - url
                        base_url:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            The base URL for the custom taxes RESTful API. The
                            value should include the route prefix to the
                            quotation API.

                            * Required if the `api_version` is set to `v1`.

                            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom`
                            and `api_version` is set to `v1`, the given
                            configuration will be used.
                          example: https://my.custom.domain/base_path
                          format: uri
                        authentication:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            method:
                              allOf:
                                - type: string
                                  enum:
                                    - Basic
                                  description: Custom provider authentication method.
                                  example: Basic
                            username:
                              type: string
                              description: Custom provider Basic authentication username.
                              example: username
                            password:
                              type: string
                              description: Custom provider Basic authentication password.
                              example: secret-password
                          required:
                            - method
                            - username
                            - password
                        exemption_classes:
                          description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                          example:
                            - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              valid_countries:
                                - '*'
                            - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              valid_countries:
                                - US
                            - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                              valid_countries:
                                - CA
                              display_text:
                                en: First Nation Citizen
                                fr: Premières Nations
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              exemption_class:
                                allOf:
                                  - type: string
                                    enum:
                                      - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                                      - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                                      - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                                      - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                                      - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                                      - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                                      - RESALE
                                      - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                                      - OTHER
                                      - NON_RESIDENT
                                      - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                                      - CUSTOM_*
                                    description: >-
                                      The tax exemption class that identifies
                                      the customer's group/organization that
                                      accredited them with the tax exemption
                                      status.

                                      * For custom tax exemption classes, the
                                      `CUSTOM_` prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE
                                      key can be used. Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                                    example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              valid_countries:
                                type: array
                                description: >-
                                  The list of countries where this tax exemption
                                  class is valid.
                                items:
                                  type: string

                                    - '*'
                                    - AF

                              display_text:
                                type: object
                                description: >-
                                  Display text to be used in Associate App while
                                  rendering the exemption class.

                                  * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                                  * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption
                                  classes.

                                  * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language
                                  code.

                                  * Must include English translation by default.
                                example:

                            required:

                              - valid_countries
                      required:
                        - api_version
              required:
                - store_id
                - country_code
            examples:
              TaxStrategyOverride:
                summary: Tax strategy override
                description: >-
                  Example configuration setting the tax calculation strategy to
                  be used for this store. Overrides the strategy set on the
                  tenant level.
                value:
                  store_id: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
                  country_code: AT
                  tax_calculation_strategy: fixedrate
              FixedRateProvider:
                summary: Fixed rate provider override
                description: >-
                  Example configuration setting the fixed rate configuration to
                  be used for this store. Overrides the same provider
                  configuration set on the tenant level.
                value:
                  store_id: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
                  country_code: DE
                  tax_calculation_strategy: fixedrate
                  fixed_rate:
                    tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Austria
                    tax_rate: 0.2
                    exemption_classes:
                      - exemption_class: CUSTOM_ITALY_1
                        valid_countries:
                          - IT
                        display_text:
                          en: Diplomatic sales
                          it: Vendite diplomatiche
                      - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_1
                        valid_countries:
                          - CA
                        display_text:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
              FixedRatePerCountryProvider:
                summary: Fixed rate per country provider override
                description: >-
                  Example configuration setting the fixed rate per country
                  configuration to be used for this store. Overrides the same
                  provider configuration set on the tenant level.
                value:
                  store_id: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
                  country_code: DE
                  tax_calculation_strategy: fixed_rate_per_country
                  fixed_rate_per_country:
                    AT:
                      tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Austria
                      tax_rate: 0.2
                    DE:
                      tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Germany
                      tax_rate: 0.19
                    IT:
                      tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Italy
                      tax_rate: 0.22
              AvalaraProvider:
                summary: Avalara/AvaTax provider override
                description: >-
                  Example configuration setting the avalara configuration to be
                  used for this store. Overrides the same provider configuration
                  set on the tenant level.
                value:
                  store_id: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
                  country_code: DE
                  tax_calculation_strategy: avalara
                  avalara:
                    account_number: '2000123456'
                    company_code: COMPANYCODE
                    default_customer_code: Anonymous customer
                    license_key: C1234567890ABCFE
                    environment: sandbox
                    exemption_classes:
                      - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                        avalara_entity_use_code: WORLDWIDE_CHARITY
                        valid_countries:
                          - '*'
                      - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                        avalara_entity_use_code: US_FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                        valid_countries:
                          - US
                      - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_1
                        avalara_entity_use_code: CANADA_FNC
                        valid_countries:
                          - CA
                        display_text:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
              VertexProvider:
                summary: Vertex provider override
                description: >-
                  Example configuration setting the vertex configuration to be
                  used for this store. Overrides the same provider configuration
                  set on the tenant level.
                value:
                  store_id: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
                  country_code: DE
                  tax_calculation_strategy: vertex
                  vertex:
                    company_code: '1234'
                    division_code: '1234'
                    soap_url: >-
                      https://sandboxap2.na1.ondemand.vertexinc.com/vertex-ws/services/CalculateTax90
                    login_type: trusted_id
                    trusted_id: $ab.7p5gBFOrUl
                    flexible_fields:
                      - extended_attribute_name: productClass
                        target_field_id: 1
                        target_field_type: flexible_code_field
                      - extended_attribute_name: shoeSize
                        target_field_id: 1
                        target_field_type: flexible_numeric_field
                    exemption_classes:
                      - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                        vertex_class_code: '02'
                        valid_countries:
                          - '*'
                      - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                        vertex_class_code: '01'
                        valid_countries:
                          - US
                      - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_1
                        vertex_class_code: '03'
                        valid_countries:
                          - CA
                        display_text:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
              CustomProviderV1:
                summary: Custom provider V1 override
                description: >-
                  Example configuration setting the custom V1 configuration to
                  be used for this store. Overrides the same provider
                  configuration set on the tenant level.
                value:
                  store_id: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
                  country_code: DE
                  tax_calculation_strategy: custom
                  custom:
                    api_version: v1
                    base_url: https://my-custom-tax-url.com
                    exemption_classes:
                      - exemption_class: CUSTOM_ITALY_1
                        valid_countries:
                          - IT
                        display_text:
                          en: Diplomatic sales
                          it: Vendite diplomatiche
                      - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_1
                        valid_countries:
                          - CA
                        display_text:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
              CustomProviderV1Authentication:
                summary: Custom provider V1 with authentication override
                description: >-
                  Example configuration setting the custom V1 with
                  authentication configuration to be used for this store.
                  Overrides the same provider configuration set on the tenant
                  level.
                value:
                  store_id: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
                  country_code: DE
                  tax_calculation_strategy: custom
                  custom:
                    api_version: v1
                    base_url: https://my-custom-tax-url.com
                    authentication:
                      method: Basic
                      username: my-username
                      password: my-password
                    exemption_classes:
                      - exemption_class: CUSTOM_ITALY_1
                        valid_countries:
                          - IT
                        display_text:
                          en: Diplomatic sales
                          it: Vendite diplomatiche
                      - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_1
                        valid_countries:
                          - CA
                        display_text:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
              CustomProviderV0:
                summary: Custom provider V0 (Avalara) override
                description: >-
                  Example configuration setting the custom V0 configuration to
                  be used for this store. Overrides the same provider
                  configuration set on the tenant level.
                value:
                  store_id: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
                  country_code: DE
                  tax_calculation_strategy: custom
                  custom:
                    api_version: v0-avalara
                    additional_config:
                      avalara:
                        account_number: '2000123456'
                        company_code: COMPANYCODE
                        license_key: C1234567890ABCFE
                        url: https://custom-domain.net/tax/get
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Tax configuration of the store.
          content:

                type: object
