                          description: >-
                            The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                            is relevant.
                                * '*' indicates worldwide support
                          example: '*'
                      display_text:
                        type: object
                        description: >-
                          Display text to be used in Associate App while
                          rendering the exemption class.

                          * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                          * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption classes.

                          * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.

                          * Must include English translation by default.
                        example:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
                        additionalProperties: {}
                      vertex_class_code:
                        type: string
                        description: >-
                          Vertex class code.

                          * A code used to represent groups of customers,
                          vendors, dispatchers, or recipients who have similar
                          taxability.
                        example: '01'
                        minLength: 1
                        maxLength: 20
                    required:
                      - exemption_class
                      - valid_countries
                      - vertex_class_code
                use_location_code:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    Use Vertex location code instead of address information.

                    * When this value is set to `true` the NewStore platform
                    will use the Store IDs to communicate origin and destination
                    addresses instead of using standard address information
                    (address line 1, postal code, etc.).

                    * Store IDs are currently only available for cash & carry
                    orders, all other order scenarios will use the standard
                    address information to communicate origin and destination
                    addresses even with this value set to `true`.

                    * In case the NewStore Store ID length is longer than 20
                    characters, NewStore will only send the first 20 characters
                    as Vertex field length is capped at that limit.
                  example: true
                  default: false
                jurisdiction_in_tax_name_enabled:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    Enable appending the jurisdiction name to the tax line's
                    `tax_name` field.

                    * This can help identify which jurisdiction imposed a given
                    tax line.

                    * Example: The tax name `Sales And Use Tax - Colorado`
                    includes the jurisdiction name `Colorado` when the given
                    flag is enabled.
                  example: true
              required:
                - company_code
                - soap_url
                - login_type
        custom:
          description: >-
            Custom provider configuration.

            * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to `custom`.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom`, the given
            configuration will be used.
          example:
            api_version: v1
            base_url: https://my-custom-tax-url.com
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                api_version:
                  allOf:
                    - type: string
                      enum:
                        - v0-avalara
                        - v1
                      description: Custom provider API version.
                      example: v1
                additional_config:
                  description: >-
                    Other necessary configuration specific to the custom
                    provider (currently configs for non-officially supported
                    avalara based custom implementation)
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        avalara:
                          description: >-
                            Avalara custom provider configuration.

                            * Required if the `api_version` is set to
                            `v0-avalara`.

                            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom`
                            and `api_version` is set to `v0-avalara`, the given
                            configuration will be used.
                          example:
                            account_number: '2000123456'
                            company_code: NEWSTOREINC
                            license_key: C1234567890ABCFE
                            url: https://custom.provider.net/1.0/tax/get
                          allOf:
                            - type: object
                              properties:
                                account_number:
                                  type: string
                                  description: AvaTax account number or account ID.
                                  example: '2000123456'
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 10
                                company_code:
                                  type: string
                                  description: >-
                                    Company code that identifies the company in
                                    the AvaTax account.

                                    * Value is case-sensitive.

                                    * Declared during the company setup in the
                                    AvaTax Admin Console.
                                  example: NEWSTOREINC
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 25
                                license_key:
                                  type: string
                                  description: AvaTax license key.
                                  format: password
                                  example: C1234567890ABCFE
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 16
                                url:
                                  type: string
                                  description: >-
                                    Custom provider RESTful API URL that uses
                                    AvaTax v1 schema. Will be used for tax
                                    calculations.
                                  example: https://custom.provider.net/1.0/tax/get
                                  format: uri
                              required:
                                - account_number
                                - company_code
                                - license_key
                                - url
                base_url:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    The base URL for the custom taxes RESTful API. The value
                    should include the route prefix to the quotation API.

                    * Required if the `api_version` is set to `v1`.

                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom` and
                    `api_version` is set to `v1`, the given configuration will
                    be used.
                  example: https://my.custom.domain/base_path
                  format: uri
                authentication:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    method:
                      allOf:
                        - type: string
                          enum:
                            - Basic
                          description: Custom provider authentication method.
                          example: Basic
                    username:
                      type: string
                      description: Custom provider Basic authentication username.
                      example: username
                    password:
                      type: string
                      description: Custom provider Basic authentication password.
                      example: secret-password
                  required:
                    - method
                    - username
                    - password
                exemption_classes:
                  description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                  example:
                    - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        - '*'
                    - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                      valid_countries:
                        - US
                    - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                      valid_countries:
                        - CA
                      display_text:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      exemption_class:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                              - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                              - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                              - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                              - RESALE
                              - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                              - OTHER
                              - NON_RESIDENT
                              - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                              - CUSTOM_*
                            description: >-
                              The tax exemption class that identifies the
                              customer's group/organization that accredited them
                              with the tax exemption status.

                              * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                              prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                              Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                            example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        type: array
                        description: >-
                          The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                          is valid.
                        items:
                          type: string

                          rendering the exemption class.

                          * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption classes.

                          * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.

                          * Must include English translation by default.
                        example:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
                        additionalProperties: {}
                    required:
                      - exemption_class
                      - valid_countries
              required:
                - api_version
        tax_committing_enabled:
          type: boolean
          description: >-
            Enable tax committing to the selected tax calculation strategy. The
            tax committing feature is only supported for in-store orders.
          example: true
      required:
        - tax_calculation_strategy
        - fixed_rate
    TenantConfigDto:
      type: object
      properties:
        tax_calculation_strategy:
          allOf:
            - type: string
              enum:
                - fixedrate
                - fixed_rate_per_country
                - avalara
                - vertex
                - custom
              description: Tax calculation strategy.
              example: fixedrate
        fixed_rate:
          description: >-
            Fixed rate configuration.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `fixedrate`, the
            specified tax rate will be used.

            * For the other tax calculation strategies, the specified rate will
            be used as a fallback if the tax calculation fails (e.g. if the tax
            provider is not reachable).

            * The specified rate will be used as a fallback by the Associate App
            in offline-mode.
          example:
            tax_rate: 0.2
            tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Austria
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                tax_rate:
                  type: number
                  description: |-
                    Tax rate to be used as a fixed rate during tax calculations.
                    * Allows up to 5 decimal points.
                  example: 0.19
                  format: double
                tax_name:
                  type: string
                  description: Tax name to be used in the tax lines.
                  example: Standard VAT rate
                exemption_classes:
                  description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                  example:
                    - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        - '*'
                    - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                      valid_countries:
                        - US
                    - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                      valid_countries:
                        - CA
                      display_text:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      exemption_class:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                              - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                              - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                              - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                              - RESALE
                              - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                              - OTHER
                              - NON_RESIDENT
                              - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                              - CUSTOM_*
                            description: >-
                              The tax exemption class that identifies the
                              customer's group/organization that accredited them
                              with the tax exemption status.

                              * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                              prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                              Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                            example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        type: array
                        description: >-
                          The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                          is valid.
                        items:
                          type: string
                          enum:
                            - '*'
                            - AF
                            - AX
                            - AL
                            - DZ
                            - AS
                            - AD
                            - AO
                            - AI
                            - AQ
                            - AG

                          description: >-
                            The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                            is relevant.
                                * '*' indicates worldwide support
                          example: '*'
                      display_text:
                        type: object
                        description: >-
                          Display text to be used in Associate App while
                          rendering the exemption class.

                          * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                          * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption classes.

                          * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.

                          * Must include English translation by default.
                        example:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
                        additionalProperties: {}
                    required:
                      - exemption_class
                      - valid_countries
              required:
                - tax_rate
        fixed_rate_per_country:
          type: object
          description: >-
            Fixed rate configuration per country.

            * Uses ISO 3166 Alpha-2 format as the key in upper-case.

            * Fixed rate specification can be defined under each country key for
            the desired countries.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to
            `fixed_rate_per_country`:
              * Fixed rate configuration must be configured.
              * The specified tax rate will be used if the country code of the store has a fixed rate configuration.
              * The tax calculation will fail if the country code of the store does not have a fixed rate configuration.
          example:
            AT:
              tax_rate: 0.2
              tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Austria
            DE:
              tax_rate: 0.19
              tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Germany
          additionalProperties:
            type: object
            properties:
              tax_rate:
                type: number
                description: |-
                  Tax rate to be used as a fixed rate during tax calculations.
                  * Allows up to 5 decimal points.
                example: 0.19
                format: double
              tax_name:
                type: string
                description: Tax name to be used in the tax lines.
                example: Standard VAT rate
              exemption_classes:
                description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                example:
                  - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                    valid_countries:
                      - '*'
                  - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                    valid_countries:
                      - US
                  - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                    valid_countries:
                      - CA
                    display_text:
                      en: First Nation Citizen
                      fr: Premières Nations
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    exemption_class:
                      allOf:
                        - type: string
                          enum:
                            - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                            - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                            - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                            - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                            - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                            - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                            - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                            - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                            - RESALE
                            - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                            - OTHER
                            - NON_RESIDENT
                            - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                            - CUSTOM_*
                          description: >-
                            The tax exemption class that identifies the
                            customer's group/organization that accredited them
                            with the tax exemption status.

                            * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                            prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                            Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                          example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION

                      type: array
                      description: >-
                        The list of countries where this tax exemption class is
                        valid.

            required:
              - tax_rate
        avalara:
          description: >-
            Avalara configuration.

            * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to `avalara`.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `avalara`, the given
            configuration will be used.

            * If the Avalara configuration is defined, the configuration will be
            validated through a ping request to Avalara, which will validate the
            authenticity of Avalara credentials.
          example:
            account_number: '2000123456'
            company_code: NEWSTOREINC
            default_customer_code: Anonymous customer
            license_key: C1234567890ABCFE
            environment: sandbox
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                account_number:
                  type: string
                  description: AvaTax account number or account ID.
                  example: '2000123456'
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 10
                company_code:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    Company code that identifies the company in the AvaTax
                    account.

                    * Value is case-sensitive.

                    * Declared during the company setup in the AvaTax Admin
                    Console.
                  example: NEWSTOREINC
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 25
                default_customer_code:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    Default customer code. Will be used in case when no
                    ConsumerUUID is provided.
                  example: Anonymous customer
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 50
                license_key:
                  type: string
                  description: AvaTax license key.
                  format: password
                  example: C1234567890ABCFE
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 16
                environment:
                  allOf:
                    - type: string
                      enum:
                        - sandbox
                        - production
                      description: Avalara environment.
                      example: sandbox
                exemption_classes:
                  description: >-
                    A list of mappings between `ExemptionClass` enum and Avalara
                    custom entity use codes.
                  example:
                    - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      avalara_entity_use_code: E
                      valid_countries:
                        - '*'
                    - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                      avalara_entity_use_code: A
                      valid_countries:
                        - US
                    - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                      avalara_entity_use_code: CANADA_FNC
                      valid_countries:
                        - CA
                      display_text:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      exemption_class:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                              - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                              - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                              - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                              - RESALE
                              - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                              - OTHER
                              - NON_RESIDENT
                              - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                              - CUSTOM_*
                            description: >-
                              The tax exemption class that identifies the
                              customer's group/organization that accredited them
                              with the tax exemption status.

                              * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                              prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                              Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                            example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        type: array
                        description: >-
                          The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                          is valid.
                        items:
                          type: string
                          enum:
                            - '*'
                            - AF

                      avalara_entity_use_code:
                        type: string
                        description: >-
                          Avalara entity use code.

                          * For pre-defined tax exemption classes, value must
                          correspond to the Avalara entity use code. For the
                          possible options, please refer to the [List of entity
                          use
                          codes](https://knowledge.avalara.com/bundle/hff1682048150115_hff1682048150115/page/List_of_entity_use_codes.html).

                          * For custom tax exemption classes, value must
                          correspond to the custom entity use code defined under
                          the exempt entity custom tax rule.
                        example: CANADA_FNC
                        minLength: 1
                        maxLength: 25
                    required:
                      - exemption_class
                      - valid_countries
                      - avalara_entity_use_code
              required:
                - account_number
                - company_code
                - license_key
                - environment
        vertex:
          description: >-
            Vertex configuration.

            * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to `vertex`.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `vertex`, the given
            configuration will be used.

            * If the Vertex configuration is defined, the configuration will be
            validated through a ping request to Vertex, which will validate the
            authenticity of Vertex credentials.
          example:
            company_code: '1234'
            division_code: '1234'
            soap_url: >-
              https://sandboxap2.na1.ondemand.vertexinc.com/vertex-ws/services/CalculateTax90
            login_type: trusted_id
            trusted_id: 9SDPdc9bo3
            flexible_fields:
              - extended_attribute_name: productClass
                target_field_id: 1
                target_field_type: flexible_code_field
              - extended_attribute_name: shoeSize
                target_field_id: 1
                target_field_type: flexible_numeric_field
            administrative_origin:
              street_address_1: Potsdamer Str. 7
              street_address_2: Potsdamer Platz
              city: Berlin
              main_division: Berlin
              postal_code: '10785'
              country: DE
              currency_code: EUR
              currency_value: 1.1
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                company_code:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    Vertex taxpayer code of the company.

                    * Identifies the top-level legal entity (company).

                    * The value should be set to the taxpayer code of the
                    top-level taxpayer (company).
                  example: '1234'
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 40
                division_code:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    Vertex taxpayer code of the division.

                    * Identifies the mid-level legal entity (division) under a
                    top-level legal entity (company).

                    * If exists, the value can be set to the taxpayer code of
                    the mid-level taxpayer (division) under a top-level taxpayer
                    (company).
                  example: '1234'
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 40
                soap_url:
                  type: string
                  description: SOAP URL of the Vertex CalculateTax endpoint.
                  example: >-
                    https://sandboxap2.na1.ondemand.vertexinc.com/vertex-ws/services/CalculateTax90
                  format: uri
                login_type:
                  allOf:
                    - type: string
                      enum:
                        - trusted_id
                        - user_and_password
                      description: >-
                        Vertex Login Type.

                        * Used for selecting the authentication method.

                        * `trusted_id` field is required if `login_type` is set
                        to `trusted_id`.

                        * `username` and `password` fields are required if
                        `login_type` is set to `user_and_password`.
                      example: trusted_id
                trusted_id:
                  type: string
                  description: |-
                    Trusted ID of the Vertex account.
                    * Required if `login_type` is set to `trusted_id`.
                  format: password
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 255
                username:
                  type: string
                  description: |-
                    Username of the Vertex account.
                    * Required if `login_type` is set to `user_and_password`.
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 255
                password:
                  type: string
                  description: |-
                    Password of the Vertex account.
                    * Required if `login_type` is set to `user_and_password`.
                  format: password
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 255
                flexible_fields:
                  description: >-
                    The mapping between extended attributes of items in the
                    NewStore platform and flexible fields as defined in Vertex.
                  example:
                    - extended_attribute_name: productClass
                      target_field_id: 1
                      target_field_type: flexible_code_field
                    - extended_attribute_name: shoeSize
                      target_field_id: 1
                      target_field_type: flexible_numeric_field
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      extended_attribute_name:
                        type: string
                        description: The name of the extended attribute.
                        example: shoeSize
                        minLength: 1
                        maxLength: 255
                      target_field_id:
                        type: integer
                        description: >-
                          Vertex flexible field identifier.

                          * If `target_field_type` is set to
                          `flexible_code_field`, maximum length is 25.

                          * If `target_field_type` is set to
                          `flexible_numeric_field`, maximum length is 10.

                          * If `target_field_type` is set to
                          `flexible_date_field`, maximum length is 5.
                        format: int32
                        minimum: 0
                        maximum: 25
                        example: 1
                      target_field_type:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - flexible_code_field
                              - flexible_numeric_field
                              - flexible_date_field
                            description: Vertex flexible field type.
                            example: flexible_numeric_field
                    required:
                      - extended_attribute_name
                      - target_field_id
                      - target_field_type
                administrative_origin:
                  description: >-
                    Administrative origin information of the legal entity.
                    Should be set based on the retailer corporate information.
                  example:
                    street_address_1: Potsdamer Str. 7
                    street_address_2: Potsdamer Platz
                    city: Berlin
                    main_division: Berlin
                    postal_code: '10785'
                    country: Germany
                    currency_code: USD
                    currency_value: 1.1
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        street_address_1:
                          type: string
                          description: The first line of the street address.
                          example: Potsdamer Str. 7
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 100
                        street_address_2:
                          type: string
                          description: The second line of the street address.
                          example: Potsdamer Platz
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 100
                        city:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            The proper name of the city used to determine the
                            Tax Area ID.
                          example: Berlin
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 60
                        main_division:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            The proper name or the postal abbreviation of the
                            state, province, or territory used to determine the
                            Tax Area ID.
                          example: Berlin
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 60
                        postal_code:
                          type: string
                          description: The postal code used to determine the Tax Area ID
                          example: '10785'
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 20
                        country:
                          allOf:
                            - type: string
                              enum:
                                - AF
                                - AX

                              description: Currency code in ISO 4217 format.

                        currency_value:
                          type: number

                            transaction currency amount to the filing currency
                            amount.

                        - postal_code
                        - country
                        - currency_code
                        - currency_value
                exemption_classes:
                  description: >-
                    A list of mappings between `ExemptionClass` enum and Vertex
                    class codes.
                  example:
                    - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      vertex_class_code: '02'
                      valid_countries:
                        - '*'
                    - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                      vertex_class_code: '01'
                      valid_countries:
                        - US
                    - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA
                      vertex_class_code: '03'
                      valid_countries:
                        - CA
                      display_text:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      exemption_class:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                              - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                              - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                              - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                              - RESALE
                              - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                              - OTHER
                              - NON_RESIDENT
                              - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                              - CUSTOM_*
                            description: >-
                              The tax exemption class that identifies the
                              customer's group/organization that accredited them
                              with the tax exemption status.

                              * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                              prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                              Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                            example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        type: array
                        description: >-
                          The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                          is valid.
                        items:
                          type: string
                          enum:
                            - '*'
                            - AF
                            - AX
                            - AL
                            - DZ
                            - AS
                            - AD
                            - AO
                            - AI
                            - AQ
                            - AG
                            - AR

                            - ZW
                          description: >-
                            The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                            is relevant.
                                * '*' indicates worldwide support
                          example: '*'
                      display_text:
                        type: object
                        description: >-
                          Display text to be used in Associate App while
                          rendering the exemption class.

                          * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                          * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption classes.

                          * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.

                          * Must include English translation by default.
                        example:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
                        additionalProperties: {}
                      vertex_class_code:
                        type: string
                        description: >-
                          Vertex class code.

                          * A code used to represent groups of customers,
                          vendors, dispatchers, or recipients who have similar
                          taxability.
                        example: '01'
                        minLength: 1
                        maxLength: 20
                    required:
                      - exemption_class
                      - valid_countries
                      - vertex_class_code
                use_location_code:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    Use Vertex location code instead of address information.

                    * When this value is set to `true` the NewStore platform
                    will use the Store IDs to communicate origin and destination
                    addresses instead of using standard address information
                    (address line 1, postal code, etc.).

                    * Store IDs are currently only available for cash & carry
                    orders, all other order scenarios will use the standard
                    address information to communicate origin and destination
                    addresses even with this value set to `true`.

                    * In case the NewStore Store ID length is longer than 20
                    characters, NewStore will only send the first 20 characters
                    as Vertex field length is capped at that limit.
                  example: true
                  default: false
                jurisdiction_in_tax_name_enabled:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    Enable appending the jurisdiction name to the tax line's
                    `tax_name` field.

                    * This can help identify which jurisdiction imposed a given
                    tax line.

                    * Example: The tax name `Sales And Use Tax - Colorado`
                    includes the jurisdiction name `Colorado` when the given
                    flag is enabled.
                  example: true
              required:
                - company_code
                - soap_url
                - login_type
        custom:
          description: >-
            Custom provider configuration.

            * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to `custom`.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom`, the given
            configuration will be used.
          example:
            api_version: v1
            base_url: https://my-custom-tax-url.com
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                api_version:
                  allOf:
                    - type: string
                      enum:
                        - v0-avalara
                        - v1
                      description: Custom provider API version.
                      example: v1
                additional_config:
                  description: >-
                    Other necessary configuration specific to the custom
                    provider (currently configs for non-officially supported
                    avalara based custom implementation)
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        avalara:
                          description: >-
                            Avalara custom provider configuration.

                            * Required if the `api_version` is set to
                            `v0-avalara`.

                            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom`
                            and `api_version` is set to `v0-avalara`, the given
                            configuration will be used.
                          example:
                            account_number: '2000123456'
                            company_code: NEWSTOREINC
                            license_key: C1234567890ABCFE
                            url: https://custom.provider.net/1.0/tax/get
                          allOf:
                            - type: object
                              properties:
                                account_number:
                                  type: string
                                  description: AvaTax account number or account ID.
                                  example: '2000123456'
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 10
                                company_code:
                                  type: string
                                  description: >-
                                    Company code that identifies the company in
                                    the AvaTax account.

                                    * Value is case-sensitive.

                                    * Declared during the company setup in the
                                    AvaTax Admin Console.
                                  example: NEWSTOREINC
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 25
                                license_key:
                                  type: string
                                  description: AvaTax license key.
                                  format: password
                                  example: C1234567890ABCFE
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 16
                                url:
                                  type: string
                                  description: >-
                                    Custom provider RESTful API URL that uses
                                    AvaTax v1 schema. Will be used for tax
                                    calculations.
                                  example: https://custom.provider.net/1.0/tax/get
                                  format: uri
                              required:
                                - account_number
                                - company_code
                                - license_key
                                - url
                base_url:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    The base URL for the custom taxes RESTful API. The value
                    should include the route prefix to the quotation API.

                    * Required if the `api_version` is set to `v1`.

                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom` and
                    `api_version` is set to `v1`, the given configuration will
                    be used.
                  example: https://my.custom.domain/base_path
                  format: uri
                authentication:
                  description: >-
                    Custom provider API authentication method.

                    * Currently, only Basic authentication is supported.

                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom` and
                    `api_version` is set to `v1`, the given configuration will
                    be used.
                  example:
                    method: Basic
                    username: user
                    password: pass
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        method:
                          allOf:
                            - type: string
                              enum:
                                - Basic
                              description: Custom provider authentication method.
                              example: Basic
                        username:
                          type: string
                          description: Custom provider Basic authentication username.
                          example: username
                        password:
                          type: string
                          description: Custom provider Basic authentication password.
                          example: secret-password
                      required:
                        - method
                        - username
                        - password
                exemption_classes:
                  description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                  example:
                    - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        - '*'
                    - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                      valid_countries:
                        - US
                    - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                      valid_countries:
                        - CA
                      display_text:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      exemption_class:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                              - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                              - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                              - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                              - RESALE
                              - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                              - OTHER
                              - NON_RESIDENT
                              - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                              - CUSTOM_*
                            description: >-
                              The tax exemption class that identifies the
                              customer's group/organization that accredited them
                              with the tax exemption status.

                              * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                              prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                              Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                            example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        type: array
                        description: >-
                          The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                          is valid.
                        items:
                          type: string
                          enum:
                            - '*'
                            - AF
                            - AX
                            - AL
                            - DZ
                            - AS

                          description: >-

                                * '*' indicates worldwide support
                          example: '*'
                      display_text:
                        type: object
                        description: >-
                          Display text to be used in Associate App while
                          rendering the exemption class.

                          * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                          * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption classes.

                          * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.

                          * Must include English translation by default.
                        example:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
                        additionalProperties: {}
                    required:
                      - exemption_class
                      - valid_countries
              required:
                - api_version
        tax_committing_enabled:
          type: boolean
          description: >-
            Enable tax committing to the selected tax calculation strategy. The
            tax committing feature is only supported for in-store orders.
          example: true
        tenant:
          type: string
          description: Tenant identifier.
          example: dodici
        version:
          type: integer
          description: |-
            Version number of the config.
            * Version number 0 represents the system defaults.
          format: int32
          example: 1
        created_at:
          format: date-time
          type: string
          description: Creation date of the configuration.
          example: '2023-02-28T16:58:46.961Z'
        updated_at:
          format: date-time
          type: string
          description: Latest update date of the configuration.
          example: '2023-02-28T16:58:46.961Z'
        updated_by:
          type: string
          description: >-
            Identifier of the user who updated the current version of the
            configuration.
          example: '2136871599'
        is_deleted:
          type: boolean
          description: Flag that indicates if the configuration was deleted.
          example: false
      required:
        - tax_calculation_strategy
        - fixed_rate
        - tenant
        - version
        - created_at
        - updated_at
        - updated_by
    TenantConfigUpdateDto:
      type: object
      properties:
        tax_calculation_strategy:
          allOf:
            - type: string
              enum:
                - fixedrate
                - fixed_rate_per_country
                - avalara
                - vertex
                - custom
              description: Tax calculation strategy.
              example: fixedrate
        fixed_rate:
          description: >-
            Fixed rate configuration.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `fixedrate`, the
            specified tax rate will be used.

            * For the other tax calculation strategies, the specified rate will
            be used as a fallback if the tax calculation fails (e.g. if the tax
            provider is not reachable).

            * The specified rate will be used as a fallback by the Associate App
            in offline-mode.
          example:
            tax_rate: 0.2
            tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Austria
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                tax_rate:
                  type: number
                  description: |-
                    Tax rate to be used as a fixed rate during tax calculations.
                    * Allows up to 5 decimal points.
                  example: 0.19
                  format: double
                tax_name:
                  type: string
                  description: Tax name to be used in the tax lines.
                  example: Standard VAT rate
                exemption_classes:
                  description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                  example:
                    - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        - '*'
                    - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                      valid_countries:
                        - US
                    - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                      valid_countries:
                        - CA
                      display_text:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      exemption_class:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                              - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                              - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                              - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                              - RESALE
                              - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                              - OTHER
                              - NON_RESIDENT
                              - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                              - CUSTOM_*
                            description: >-
                              The tax exemption class that identifies the
                              customer's group/organization that accredited them
                              with the tax exemption status.

                              * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                              prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                              Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                            example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        type: array
                        description: >-
                          The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                          is valid.
                        items:
                          type: string

        fixed_rate_per_country:
          type: object
          description: >-
            Fixed rate configuration per country.

            * Uses ISO 3166 Alpha-2 format as the key in upper-case.

            * Fixed rate specification can be defined under each country key for
            the desired countries.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to
            `fixed_rate_per_country`:
              * Fixed rate configuration must be configured.
              * The specified tax rate will be used if the country code of the store has a fixed rate configuration.
              * The tax calculation will fail if the country code of the store does not have a fixed rate configuration.
          example:
            AT:
              tax_rate: 0.2
              tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Austria
            DE:
              tax_rate: 0.19
              tax_name: Standard VAT rate for Germany
          additionalProperties:
            type: object
            properties:
              tax_rate:
                type: number
                description: |-
                  Tax rate to be used as a fixed rate during tax calculations.
                  * Allows up to 5 decimal points.
                example: 0.19
                format: double
              tax_name:
                type: string
                description: Tax name to be used in the tax lines.
                example: Standard VAT rate
              exemption_classes:
                description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                example:
                  - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                    valid_countries:
                      - '*'
                  - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                    valid_countries:
                      - US
                  - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                    valid_countries:
                      - CA
                    display_text:
                      en: First Nation Citizen
                      fr: Premières Nations
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    exemption_class:
                      allOf:
                        - type: string
                          enum:
                            - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                            - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                            - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                            - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                            - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                            - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                            - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                            - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                            - RESALE
                            - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                            - OTHER
                            - NON_RESIDENT
                            - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                            - CUSTOM_*
                          description: >-
                            The tax exemption class that identifies the
                            customer's group/organization that accredited them
                            with the tax exemption status.

                            * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                            prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                            Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                          example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                    valid_countries:
                      type: array
                      description: >-
                        The list of countries where this tax exemption class is
                        valid.
                      items:
                        type: string
                        enum:
                          - '*'
                          - AF

                          - TO
                          - TT
                          - TN
                          - TR
                          - TM
                          - TC
                          - TV
                          - UG
                          - UA
                          - AE
                          - GB
                          - US
                          - UM
                          - UY
                          - UZ
                          - VU
                          - VE
                          - VN
                          - VG
                          - VI
                          - WF
                          - EH
                          - YE
                          - ZM
                          - ZW
                        description: >-
                          The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                          is relevant.
                              * '*' indicates worldwide support
                        example: '*'
                    display_text:
                      type: object
                      description: >-
                        Display text to be used in Associate App while rendering
                        the exemption class.

                        * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                        * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption classes.

                        * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.

                        * Must include English translation by default.
                      example:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                      additionalProperties: {}
                  required:
                    - exemption_class
                    - valid_countries
            required:
              - tax_rate
        avalara:
          description: >-
            Avalara configuration.

            * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to `avalara`.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `avalara`, the given
            configuration will be used.

            * If the Avalara configuration is defined, the configuration will be
            validated through a ping request to Avalara, which will validate the
            authenticity of Avalara credentials.
          example:
            account_number: '2000123456'
            company_code: NEWSTOREINC
            default_customer_code: Anonymous customer
            license_key: C1234567890ABCFE
            environment: sandbox
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                account_number:
                  type: string
                  description: AvaTax account number or account ID.
                  example: '2000123456'
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 10
                company_code:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    Company code that identifies the company in the AvaTax
                    account.

                    * Value is case-sensitive.

                    * Declared during the company setup in the AvaTax Admin
                    Console.
                  example: NEWSTOREINC
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 25
                default_customer_code:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    Default customer code. Will be used in case when no
                    ConsumerUUID is provided.
                  example: Anonymous customer
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 50
                license_key:
                  type: string
                  description: AvaTax license key.
                  format: password
                  example: C1234567890ABCFE
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 16
                environment:
                  allOf:
                    - type: string
                      enum:
                        - sandbox
                        - production
                      description: Avalara environment.
                      example: sandbox
                exemption_classes:
                  description: >-
                    A list of mappings between `ExemptionClass` enum and Avalara
                    custom entity use codes.
                  example:
                    - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      avalara_entity_use_code: E
                      valid_countries:
                        - '*'
                    - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                      avalara_entity_use_code: A
                      valid_countries:
                        - US
                    - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                      avalara_entity_use_code: CANADA_FNC
                      valid_countries:
                        - CA
                      display_text:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      exemption_class:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                              - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                              - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                              - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                              - RESALE
                              - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                              - OTHER
                              - NON_RESIDENT
                              - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                              - CUSTOM_*
                            description: >-
                              The tax exemption class that identifies the
                              customer's group/organization that accredited them
                              with the tax exemption status.

                              * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                              prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                              Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                            example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        type: array
                        description: >-
                          The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                          is valid.
                        items:
                          type: string
                          enum:
                            - '*'
                            - AF
                            - AX
                            - AL
                            - DZ
                            - AS
                            - AD
                            - AO
                            - AI
                            - AQ
                            - AG
                            - AR
                            - AM
                            - AW
                            - AU
                            - AT
                            - AZ
                            - BS
                            - BH
                            - BD
                            - BB
                            - BY
                            - BE
                            - BZ
                            - BJ
                            - BM
                            - BT
                            - BO
                            - BA
                            - BW
                            - BV
                            - BR
                            - IO
                            - BN
                            - BG
                            - BF
                            - BI
                            - KH
                            - CM
                            - CA
                            - CV
                            - KY
                            - CF
                            - TD
                            - CL
                            - CN
                            - CX
                            - CC
                            - CO
                            - KM
                            - CG
                            - CD
                            - CK
                            - CR
                            - CI
                            - HR
                            - CU
                            - CY

                          description: >-
