                            is relevant.
                                * '*' indicates worldwide support
                          example: '*'
                      display_text:
                        type: object
                        description: >-
                          Display text to be used in Associate App while
                          rendering the exemption class.

                          * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                          * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption classes.

                          * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.

                          * Must include English translation by default.
                        example:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
                        additionalProperties: {}
                      avalara_entity_use_code:
                        type: string
                        description: >-
                          Avalara entity use code.

                          * For pre-defined tax exemption classes, value must
                          correspond to the Avalara entity use code. For the
                          possible options, please refer to the [List of entity
                          use
                          codes](https://knowledge.avalara.com/bundle/hff1682048150115_hff1682048150115/page/List_of_entity_use_codes.html).

                          * For custom tax exemption classes, value must
                          correspond to the custom entity use code defined under
                          the exempt entity custom tax rule.
                        example: CANADA_FNC
                        minLength: 1
                        maxLength: 25
                    required:
                      - exemption_class
                      - valid_countries
                      - avalara_entity_use_code
        vertex:
          description: >-
            Vertex configuration.

            * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to `vertex`.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `vertex`, the given
            configuration will be used.

            * If the Vertex configuration is defined, the configuration will be
            validated through a ping request to Vertex, which will validate the
            authenticity of Vertex credentials.
          example:
            company_code: '1234'
            division_code: '1234'
            soap_url: >-
              https://sandboxap2.na1.ondemand.vertexinc.com/vertex-ws/services/CalculateTax90
            login_type: trusted_id
            trusted_id: 9SDPdc9bo3
            flexible_fields:
              - extended_attribute_name: productClass
                target_field_id: 1
                target_field_type: flexible_code_field
              - extended_attribute_name: shoeSize
                target_field_id: 1
                target_field_type: flexible_numeric_field
            administrative_origin:
              street_address_1: Potsdamer Str. 7
              street_address_2: Potsdamer Platz
              city: Berlin
              main_division: Berlin
              postal_code: '10785'
              country: DE
              currency_code: EUR
              currency_value: 1.1
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                company_code:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    Vertex taxpayer code of the company.

                    * Identifies the top-level legal entity (company).

                    * The value should be set to the taxpayer code of the
                    top-level taxpayer (company).
                  example: '1234'
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 40
                division_code:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    Vertex taxpayer code of the division.

                    * Identifies the mid-level legal entity (division) under a
                    top-level legal entity (company).

                    * If exists, the value can be set to the taxpayer code of
                    the mid-level taxpayer (division) under a top-level taxpayer
                    (company).
                  example: '1234'
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 40
                soap_url:
                  type: string
                  description: SOAP URL of the Vertex CalculateTax endpoint.
                  example: >-
                    https://sandboxap2.na1.ondemand.vertexinc.com/vertex-ws/services/CalculateTax90
                  format: uri
                login_type:
                  allOf:
                    - type: string
                      enum:
                        - trusted_id
                        - user_and_password
                      description: >-
                        Vertex Login Type.

                        * Used for selecting the authentication method.

                        * `trusted_id` field is required if `login_type` is set
                        to `trusted_id`.

                        * `username` and `password` fields are required if
                        `login_type` is set to `user_and_password`.
                      example: trusted_id
                trusted_id:
                  type: string
                  description: |-
                    Trusted ID of the Vertex account.
                    * Required if `login_type` is set to `trusted_id`.
                  format: password
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 255
                username:
                  type: string
                  description: |-
                    Username of the Vertex account.
                    * Required if `login_type` is set to `user_and_password`.
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 255
                password:
                  type: string
                  description: |-
                    Password of the Vertex account.
                    * Required if `login_type` is set to `user_and_password`.
                  format: password
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 255
                flexible_fields:
                  description: >-
                    The mapping between extended attributes of items in the
                    NewStore platform and flexible fields as defined in Vertex.
                  example:
                    - extended_attribute_name: productClass
                      target_field_id: 1
                      target_field_type: flexible_code_field
                    - extended_attribute_name: shoeSize
                      target_field_id: 1
                      target_field_type: flexible_numeric_field
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      extended_attribute_name:
                        type: string
                        description: The name of the extended attribute.
                        example: shoeSize
                        minLength: 1
                        maxLength: 255
                      target_field_id:
                        type: integer
                        description: >-
                          Vertex flexible field identifier.

                          * If `target_field_type` is set to
                          `flexible_code_field`, maximum length is 25.

                          * If `target_field_type` is set to
                          `flexible_numeric_field`, maximum length is 10.

                          * If `target_field_type` is set to
                          `flexible_date_field`, maximum length is 5.
                        format: int32
                        minimum: 0
                        maximum: 25
                        example: 1
                      target_field_type:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - flexible_code_field
                              - flexible_numeric_field
                              - flexible_date_field
                            description: Vertex flexible field type.
                            example: flexible_numeric_field
                administrative_origin:
                  description: >-
                    Administrative origin information of the legal entity.
                    Should be set based on the retailer corporate information.
                  example:
                    street_address_1: Potsdamer Str. 7
                    street_address_2: Potsdamer Platz
                    city: Berlin
                    main_division: Berlin
                    postal_code: '10785'
                    country: Germany
                    currency_code: USD
                    currency_value: 1.1
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        street_address_1:
                          type: string
                          description: The first line of the street address.
                          example: Potsdamer Str. 7
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 100
                        street_address_2:
                          type: string
                          description: The second line of the street address.
                          example: Potsdamer Platz
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 100
                        city:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            The proper name of the city used to determine the
                            Tax Area ID.
                          example: Berlin
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 60
                        main_division:
                          type: string
                          description: >-
                            The proper name or the postal abbreviation of the
                            state, province, or territory used to determine the
                            Tax Area ID.
                          example: Berlin
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 60
                        postal_code:
                          type: string
                          description: The postal code used to determine the Tax Area ID
                          example: '10785'
                          minLength: 1
                          maxLength: 20
                        country:
                          allOf:
                            - type: string
                              enum:
                                - AF
                                - AX
                                - AL
                                - DZ
                                - AS
                                - AD
                                - AO
                                - AI
                                - AQ
                                - AG

                              description: Currency code in ISO 4217 format.
                              example: EUR
                        currency_value:
                          type: number
                          description: >-
                            The rate (multiplier) used for converting the
                            transaction currency amount to the filing currency
                            amount.
                          example: 1.1
                          format: double
                exemption_classes:
                  description: >-
                    A list of mappings between `ExemptionClass` enum and Vertex
                    class codes.
                  example:
                    - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      vertex_class_code: '02'
                      valid_countries:
                        - '*'
                    - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                      vertex_class_code: '01'
                      valid_countries:
                        - US
                    - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA
                      vertex_class_code: '03'
                      valid_countries:
                        - CA
                      display_text:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      exemption_class:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                              - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                              - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                              - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                              - RESALE
                              - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                              - OTHER
                              - NON_RESIDENT
                              - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                              - CUSTOM_*
                            description: >-
                              The tax exemption class that identifies the
                              customer's group/organization that accredited them
                              with the tax exemption status.

                              * For custom tax exemption classes, the `CUSTOM_`
                              prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                              Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                            example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        type: array
                        description: >-
                          The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                          is valid.
                        items:
                          type: string
                          enum:
                            - '*'
                            - AF
                            - AX
                            - AL
                            - DZ
                            - AS
                            - AD
                            - AO
                            - AI
                            - AQ

                            - ZW
                          description: >-
                            The list of countries where this tax exemption class
                            is relevant.
                                * '*' indicates worldwide support
                          example: '*'
                      display_text:
                        type: object
                        description: >-
                          Display text to be used in Associate App while
                          rendering the exemption class.

                          * Required for custom tax exemption classes.

                          * Optional for pre-defined tax exemption classes.

                          * Keys must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.

                          * Must include English translation by default.
                        example:
                          en: First Nation Citizen
                          fr: Premières Nations
                        additionalProperties: {}
                      vertex_class_code:
                        type: string
                        description: >-
                          Vertex class code.

                          * A code used to represent groups of customers,
                          vendors, dispatchers, or recipients who have similar
                          taxability.
                        example: '01'
                        minLength: 1
                        maxLength: 20
                    required:
                      - exemption_class
                      - valid_countries
                      - vertex_class_code
                use_location_code:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    Use Vertex location code instead of address information.

                    * When this value is set to `true` the NewStore platform
                    will use the Store IDs to communicate origin and destination
                    addresses instead of using standard address information
                    (address line 1, postal code, etc.).

                    * Store IDs are currently only available for cash & carry
                    orders, all other order scenarios will use the standard
                    address information to communicate origin and destination
                    addresses even with this value set to `true`.

                    * In case the NewStore Store ID length is longer than 20
                    characters, NewStore will only send the first 20 characters
                    as Vertex field length is capped at that limit.
                  example: true
                  default: false
                jurisdiction_in_tax_name_enabled:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    Enable appending the jurisdiction name to the tax line's
                    `tax_name` field.

                    * This can help identify which jurisdiction imposed a given
                    tax line.

                    * Example: The tax name `Sales And Use Tax - Colorado`
                    includes the jurisdiction name `Colorado` when the given
                    flag is enabled.
                  example: true
        custom:
          description: >-
            Custom provider configuration.

            * Required if the `tax_calculation_strategy` is set to `custom`.

            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom`, the given
            configuration will be used.
          example:
            api_version: v1
            base_url: https://my-custom-tax-url.com
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                api_version:
                  allOf:
                    - type: string
                      enum:
                        - v0-avalara
                        - v1
                      description: Custom provider API version.
                      example: v1
                additional_config:
                  description: >-
                    Other necessary configuration specific to the custom
                    provider (currently configs for non-officially supported
                    avalara based custom implementation)
                  allOf:
                    - type: object
                      properties:
                        avalara:
                          description: >-
                            Avalara custom provider configuration.

                            * Required if the `api_version` is set to
                            `v0-avalara`.

                            * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom`
                            and `api_version` is set to `v0-avalara`, the given
                            configuration will be used.
                          example:
                            account_number: '2000123456'
                            company_code: NEWSTOREINC
                            license_key: C1234567890ABCFE
                            url: https://custom.provider.net/1.0/tax/get
                          allOf:
                            - type: object
                              properties:
                                account_number:
                                  type: string
                                  description: AvaTax account number or account ID.
                                  example: '2000123456'
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 10
                                company_code:
                                  type: string
                                  description: >-
                                    Company code that identifies the company in
                                    the AvaTax account.

                                    * Value is case-sensitive.

                                    * Declared during the company setup in the
                                    AvaTax Admin Console.
                                  example: NEWSTOREINC
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 25
                                license_key:
                                  type: string
                                  description: AvaTax license key.
                                  format: password
                                  example: C1234567890ABCFE
                                  minLength: 1
                                  maxLength: 16
                                url:
                                  type: string
                                  description: >-
                                    Custom provider RESTful API URL that uses
                                    AvaTax v1 schema. Will be used for tax
                                    calculations.
                                  example: https://custom.provider.net/1.0/tax/get
                                  format: uri
                base_url:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    The base URL for the custom taxes RESTful API. The value
                    should include the route prefix to the quotation API.

                    * Required if the `api_version` is set to `v1`.

                    * If the tax calculation strategy is set to `custom` and
                    `api_version` is set to `v1`, the given configuration will
                    be used.
                  example: https://my.custom.domain/base_path
                  format: uri
                authentication:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    method:
                      allOf:
                        - type: string
                          enum:
                            - Basic
                          description: Custom provider authentication method.
                          example: Basic
                    username:
                      type: string
                      description: Custom provider Basic authentication username.
                      example: username
                    password:
                      type: string
                      description: Custom provider Basic authentication password.
                      example: secret-password
                  required:
                    - method
                    - username
                    - password
                exemption_classes:
                  description: A list of supported exemption classes.
                  example:
                    - exemption_class: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                      valid_countries:
                        - '*'
                    - exemption_class: FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                      valid_countries:
                        - US
                    - exemption_class: CUSTOM_CANADA_FNC
                      valid_countries:
                        - CA
                      display_text:
                        en: First Nation Citizen
                        fr: Premières Nations
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      exemption_class:
                        allOf:
                          - type: string
                            enum:
                              - FEDERAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - STATE_GOVERNMENT
                              - TRIBAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - LOCAL_GOVERNMENT
                              - FOREIGN_DIPLOMAT
                              - CHARITY_ORGANIZATION
                              - RELIGIOUS_ORGANIZATION
                              - EDUCATIONAL_ORGANIZATION
                              - RESALE
                              - DIRECT_PAY_PERMIT
                              - OTHER
                              - NON_RESIDENT
                              - FIRST_NATION_CITIZEN
                              - CUSTOM_*
                            description: >-

                              customer's group/organization that accredited them
                              with the tax exemption status.

                              prefix with a UPPER_SNAKE_CASE key can be used.
                              Example: `CUSTOM_CANADA`
                            example: CHARITY_ORGANIZATION

        tax_committing_enabled:
          type: boolean
          description: >-
            Enable tax committing to the selected tax calculation strategy. The
            tax committing feature is only supported for in-store orders.
          example: true
